sub_title: Speaker üé§ LinkedIn Top voice for Female Leadership üåüI Help Women Develop Their Strategic Leadership Skills & Get More Influence On The World üéØ Want To Make Your Organisation Gender Diverse & Truly Inclusive? ‚ú® Info ‚¨á
summary:
I am a keynote speaker, executive coach and expert trainer on topics of Female Leadership & Gender Diversity with a great deal of experience in engineering and technology. 

I worked with international clients from all around the üåç, including Geneva Business School, Maersk, Rabobank, AtlasCopco, Oracle, Wageningen University of Research, Fonterra, PartnerRe and IG&H. 

I believe that the world would be a better place for everyone if women would have more influence on the world. ü§ó 
This is why I help women to get more influence on their own careers and on the world and why I help organisations to become more (gender) diverse and truly inclusive. üéØ


üéØ Here is HOW I can HELP You:

‚úÖ Raising awareness about the unconscious gender bias, why and how to fight against it 

‚úÖ Training female top talent to become more visible, better negotiators, more influential and impactful

‚úÖ Coaching higher management members to become more inclusive leaders

I use interactive and practical approach, filled with humour and based on academic research, personal experience of me and my business partners; and leading management literature. 

Here is my story:

I've started my career as an engineer specialised in helping historical buildings to stand safe. I have always had a passion for career coaching and I was helping women in getting the job they deserve and getting properly paid for that as well. After getting my PhD and working for many years in the commercial, nonprofit and governmental sector, I realised a big bold truth. 
Even when the number of girls and boys is equal during their study period, the moment you start looking higher in the corporate and/or academic ladder, there are much less women than men. Yes that is still the case! Much less women than men. 

Therefore, during the Covid-19 pandemics, I've decided to leave my corporate job to actively help women to get more influence on their own careers and on the world. Because with all my heart I believe that the world would be a better place for everyone if women would lead more negotiation processes, create national policies and corporate strategies, or decide on research funding. 

ü§ó Book a discovery call with me: https://calendly.com/booking_in_touch/30-minute-meeting-miravasic

DM me or send me an email:  mira@intouchwrm.nl

üë©‚Äçüíª Visit my company's website: https://www.intouchwrm.nl/en/

Follow me for daily content about the unwritten rules and office politics, ‚Ä®strategic leadership skills for women and unconscious gender bias
